Perceptor::

"Yes" said the blind bot "I belong to Darkfate's team, I'm Perceptor 
and this tunnel is the entrace... I don't like seem rude but we must 
go to Darkfate's base where Drillbit and the others are waitting.. 
come this is the way. My team will close the entrace..."

Perceptor came in the tunnel again; Perceptor's team was out and 
watting that Starscream,Bludgeon and Obsidian came in, in order to 
close the tunnel

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Excuse me, Jason, but the only way to become a TM3 is with the 
driver, 
> which is currently missing somewhere in the Pred base. You probably 
dont 
> remember, but Vulois, Battera, and Soundwave(deceased) are TM3's. 
Like i 
> always say, im not looking for a fight here. Just think of another 
way to 
> give Cheetor a new body. Oh, and happy birthday Roborick!
> 
> :::Starscream/Bludgeon/Obsidian:::
> 
> Starscream: That would be me.  Let me guess- your part of Darkfates 
team? Is 
> the entrance to our new base open yet? Me Bludgeon and Obsidian 
have been 
> waiting awhile.
